summary: THE COMBINATION HEADLIGHT/FOG LAMP SWITCH HEATED UP EXCESSIVELY WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS IN OPERATION.  THE PROBLEM HAS OCCURRED FOR THE LAST 10 DAYS.  ONLY THE HEAD LIGHT PORTION OF THE SWITCH CONTINUED TO OPERATE.  THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED YET.  THE CONSUMER WANTED THE DEALER TO REPAIR THE VEHICLE UNDER WARRANTY.  *MR  *CB  *NLM
